name: Ball Sort - Unity Template Project
description:
Ball Sort Puzzle a simple and addictive puzzle game. Use and storm your brain and try to solve each puzzle. This game helps you reduce time to build a similar game. You do not need to know any programming language to configure and use it. It is very easy to fill it with your own tasks, make UI changes, change your Admod ID start to gain experience in promoting your game and earning money. We will support you until you feel the most satisfaction for this asset.

Requirements :
  • Unity free license version 2019 or later
  • MacOS and Xcode for build iOS
Game Features:
  • This is a completed game designer, sound, effects, gameplay,full resource, full animation, for such a full sound
  • Amazing system level: Comes over 500 unique levels included that you can use as a starting point for your own game.
  • Ads Monetization : Admob integrated (Banner, Interstitial, Video Reward)
  • Rewarded Ads (Skip levels), Undo steps
  • In-app Purchase: Supports IAP purchases for remove ads
  • GDPR support
  • Sounds: Support sound effects are included with a settings to mute sounds in the game
  • Multiple screen sizing for most mobile devices
  • Professional and clean code, clean projects
  • Simple and attractive
  • Easy reskin for all platform.
  • New Developer friendly
  • Support multi-platform: Android, iOS, Web Player
  • Support for Unity 2019 or higher
  • Support build 64Bit, API 29
  • Support build Android App Bundle (AAB)
  • Documents update online, visual tutorial, Support 24/7
This pack includes :
  • Full game ready to publish, easy reskined
  • Clear documentation, demo apk
